quotes.quote: Creating a warm, caring, supportive, encouraging environment is probably the most important thing you can do for your family.
I don't know why, but audiences are often sympathetic to thieves. Sometimes they are more sympathetic to thieves then they are to earnest people. What does that say about society?
A good woman inspires a man; a brilliant woman interests him; a beautiful woman fascinates him; and a sympathetic woman gets him
If you don't have the gift of a loving supportive family, be that gift for someone else. It doesn't have to be a relative, just someone you know who is alone or hurting over the holiday.
SympatheticÂ people often don't communicate well, they back reflected images which hide their own depths.
AÂ sympatheticÂ person is placed in the dilemma of a swimmer among drowning men, who all catch at him, and if he gives so much as a leg or a finger, they will drown him.
A good, sympathetic review is always a wonderful surprise.
When you're ambitious, it's really hard to be supportive of other people. But it's our job to try, even though one gets jealous.
Developing ourÂ sympatheticÂ compassion is not only possible but the only reason for us to be here on earth.
Having an environment that is supportive is really important for success.
A careful andÂ sympatheticÂ sense of humour can also be a great asset when there is need to get out of difficult situations gracefully.
Man's best possession is a sympathetic wife.
There's nothing like your mother'sÂ sympatheticÂ voice to make you want to burst into tears.

A sympathetic parent might see the spark of consciousness in a baby's large eyes and eagerly accept the popular claim that babies are wonderful learners, but it is hard to avoid the impression that they begin as ignorant as bread loaves.
It's my experience that people are a lot more sympathetic if they can see you hurting.
The mostÂ sympatheticÂ of men never fully comprehend woman's concrete situation.
A careful and sympathetic sense of humour can also be a great asset when there is need to get out of difficult situations gracefully.
To beÂ sympatheticÂ without discrimination is so very debilitating.
At times our need for a sympathetic gesture is so great that we care not what exactly it signifies or how much we may have to pay for it afterwards.
Friendship is like love at its best; not blind but sympathetically all-seeing; a support which does not wait for understanding; an act of faith which does not need, but always has, reason.
There's nothing like having a sympathetic reader who asks the right questions, who understands what you're trying to achieve and only wants to make it better.
A sympathetic look always makes me feel sorry for myself.
Sympathetic characters usually have a voice. They usually don't have any trouble being heard.
AÂ sympatheticÂ friend can be quite as dear as a brother.
Dread is a sympathetic antipathy and an antipathetic sympathy.
At every crisis in one's life, it is absolute salvation to have some sympathetic friend to whom you can think aloud without restraint or misgiving.
Surround yourself with supportive people. All the negative people, man you have to push them aside.
Success in dealing with people depends on sympathetic grasp of the other person's viewpoint.
Even if you become sympathetic for somebody who has done something terrible, I don't think that necessarily makes what they did look cool.
